rules.description: Remap Capslock+Space to Command+Space in iTerm - post transform
Control+Quote to Escape in Terminal, Claude, and ChatGPT
Command+Quote to Escape in Claude and ChatGPT
Browser:  M-P to C-P (replace printing usually)
Browser: M-', C-', and Caps-' to Escape
Home key to the beginning of the line (Control + a)
End key to the end of the line (Control + e)
Home key to the beginning of the sentence (Command + Left). Doesnt work in terminal
